text: wyqwl alkafrwn: mataa yatahaqaq hdha alwaed balhshr ya mhmd? akhbrwna bzmanh 'ayuha almwmnwn, 'iin kuntum sadiqin fima tddaewn, qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla': 'iina aleilm bwqt qiam alssaeat akhtss allah bh, wa'iinama 'ana nadhir lakum akhwwifkm eaqibat kfrkm, wabyin lakum maa amrny allah bbyanh ghayat albyan
